title: Ett ufo gör entré
description: Text is in Swedish. Jonas Gardell revisits Juha and Jenny and the other children in Sävbyholm. The ones we got to know in grade school. Only now the 1970's are turning into the 80's. They are ready to graduate high school into a world where the treat of nuclear war or the Sex Pistols could be the topic on the evening news.
author: Jonas Gardell
